name: employee-tracker
description: * Create repo with the following: * Nodejs package.json that include inquirer 8.2.4 and mysql.  * Create a server.js file that include the whole setup for express (even though there might not be a website.) * Create a video of the exercise for viewing, adding, updating employee information. * create commandline options: view all departments, view all roles, view all employees, add a department, add a role, add an employee, and update an employee role
